references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive technical report on the GPT-4 large language model, which is crucial for understanding the capabilities and limitations of LLMs used in DOLPHIN.

references.paper_title: The AI Scientist: Towards Fully Automated Open-Ended Scientific Discovery
references.reason: This paper introduces a framework for open-ended auto-research, directly inspiring the design and evaluation of the DOLPHIN framework.

references.paper_title: BERT: Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding
references.reason: BERT is a foundational large language model used in various tasks within DOLPHIN, enabling it to perform tasks such as text generation and question answering.

references.paper_title: Deep Residual Learning for Image Recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces the ResNet architecture, a key component used in multiple image classification tasks within the DOLPHIN experiments.

references.paper_title: PointNet: Deep Learning on Point Sets for 3D Classification and Segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduces the PointNet architecture, a foundational model for processing 3D point cloud data, essential for the 3D classification tasks performed by DOLPHIN.
